alert.note: Alert for Northern Litchfield; Southern Litchfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 18 at 3:30PM EST until February 19 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 10 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...West winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...The Mohawk and Schoharie valleys, Capital District, eastern Catskills, Taconics and mid-Hudson Valley in eastern New York, western Massachusetts and northwestern Connecticut * WHEN...From 10 AM to 10 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
